alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 1:58PM CDT until April 20 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR WESTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 158 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Conway to near Marshfield to near Rogersville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Marshfield and Conway around 205 PM CDT. Fordland around 220 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Turners, Northview and Galloway. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 86 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
